matches.explanation: Partial match: Red Team's 'RDS cluster storing credit card transaction data is not encrypted at rest' on aws_rds_cluster.transaction_history was partially detected as 'Missing RDS Cluster Encryption' on aws_rds_cluster.transaction_history

Exact match: Red Team's 'Security group allows unrestricted inbound access to Lambda function' on aws_security_group.lambda_sg was detected as 'Overly Permissive Security Group' on aws_security_group.lambda_sg

Exact match: Red Team's 'S3 bucket containing sensitive transaction logs has no audit logging enabled' on aws_s3_bucket.transaction_logs was detected as 'Missing S3 Bucket Logging Configuration' on aws_s3_bucket.transaction_logs
